Reason: The configuration option _transientMode is performance-sensitive. This is because it directly impacts the type of journal used in the journal() method, which can have a significant effect on system performance and durability. Depending on the value of _transientMode, either a TransientJournal or a PersistentJournal is created, leading to notable performance variations at the system level. The choice between these two journals can affect execution time and memory consumption, making this configuration performance-sensitive.
